readable.content: A man sits by a red building while smoking . a man sits on a red building smoking a cigarette and drinking . A man wearing a jacket sitting and smoking a cigarette A well-groomed young man wearing dark trousers and a military-style jacket takes a puff from a cigarette in his left hand while holding a cup in his right hand . This man is smoking outside .
